title: Open Market
text: The market is very close to Marienplatz. We walked past a day after Christmas and it was closed. We came back the next day and it was open. It is a combination of solid buildings and tents.There were quite a few stalls around the area. They sold lots of different items, from fresh produce to pretzels, to cheese. It was quite a nice market to walk around to see all the different items on offer. There are also a variety of shops around the market area. There is also a bar in the middle with seating which was a nice place to just take a break. The restaurant within the market are set in tents, but this was during winter.The area itself was also quite interesting with statues and other sculptures scattered around the area. Quite a nice place for food or some sights, particularly since it is down the road from Marienplatz.

title: Не просто рынок, а площадка для праздников
text: Виктуалиенмаркт - это продовольственный рынок в старом городе, который размещается на этом месте с 1807 года. Здесь можно найти все: свежие фрукты и овощи, специи, мясные и рыбные лавки, сыры, вина и крепкие напитки, хлеб, деликатесы, цветы. Летом здесь пивной сад с празднично украшенным майским деревом. А еще на рынке 20 небольших закусочных (Imbiss-Stände) и кафе. Ежегодно на рынке проходит мероприятие - Танц дер Марктвайбер (Tanz der Marktweiber -Танец базарных торговок). Продавщицы рынка выступают в карнавальных костюмах. Еще один праздник, который проходит здесь - Праздник спаржи - Шпаргельанштих (Spargelanstich). А в  первый вторник августа празднуется Gärtnerjahrtag - День садовников. В этот день на рынке нарядные юноши и девушки дарят прохожим цветы, утром концерт традиционной баварской музыки и процессия тракторов идет от рынка до пивного ресторана Хофбройхаус. Так же в августе проводится Праздник фонтанов (Brunnenfest). Ну и, конечно же, рождественская ярмарка - Winterzauber (Зимнее волшебство). Рынок работает ежедневно, кроме воскресенья и праздничных дней.

title: Каждый раз сюда при посещении Мюнхена.
text: Добрый день! В первый раз, когда был в Мюнхене, попал на данный рынок. И с тех пор каждый раз при посещении Мюнхена иду сюда сам и веду семью, друзей, коллег. Может быть, этот рынок не такой тематический, как рождественские ярмарки и т.п., но мне нравится. Тут можно и поесть и попить, купить подарки, фрукты, овощи, сыры. Нужно только внимательно изучить время работы. К сожалению, в воскресенье он в основном не работает. Вкусно, приятно, хорошо, всегда поднимается настроение:) Особенно после похода по близлежащим магазинам. Кстати, есть туалет, что немаловажно и часто отсутствует на других рынках. title: Съестные припасы в центре города
text: Виктуалиенмаркт  является постоянным рынком в старом городе с 1807 года, открыт ежедневно, кроме воскресенья и праздничных дней.  Торговые палатки расположены вокруг пивного сада. Рынок состоит из семи частей: 1- Фрукты, сыр и дичь, 2- кафе, 3- картофель и супы, 4- Пивной сад, рыбный зал и майское дерево, 5- мясники, 6- торговцы рыбой и кошерный магазин, 7- кафе Ришард и магазины изделий ручной работы. На территории рынка расположены 6 интересных фонтанов с фигурами народных певцов и комиков. На Виктуалиенмаркт регулярно проводятся традиционные мероприятия, например, танец женщин рынка на Масленицу.  Были во второй половине дня и присели в пивном саду, пиво нормальное, еда скверная.

title: 賑やか
text: ある快晴の土曜日のお昼前、私達はこの広場をぶらぶらしました。週末のため、多くの観光客だけでなく地元の方々もたくさんここに集まっていて大変賑やかでした。広場はさほど広くないのですが、それでも人々とテントの群れで広場の全体的な大きさは全くわからないほど賑わっていました。当初の予定ではここのテナントでビールと昼食のつもりでしたが、広場内のテーブル席付きレストランは全て埋まっていました。もしこの広場内のレストランを目当てでここへ訪れるのならば、あと一時間は早くここに来るべきでした。私達はここでの食事を諦めめて買い物だけをすることにしました。買い物ですが、私達はただ何となく日持ちのする食品を買ったのですが、帰国後に改めて考えてみると、少なくとも私にはドイツを感じるお土産的なものは少ない印象でした。このように、私にはあまりここは魅力的ではありませんでしたが、マリエン広場のすぐ隣なので一連のコースとして訪れるべき場所です。出来れば朝から昼までがお奨めです。

title: Al mercato...
text: Tante bancarelle con tanti prodotti tipici e non...Si può mangiare dal classico wurstel ad una centrifuga di frutta o verdura fresca....tutto accompagnato da birra e altro....Ci piace.

title: ...non puoi astenerti!
text: Dal 1807 è il  più grande mercato della frutta e verdura della cittá. Quello che lo rende affascinante è l’accostamento di prodotti tipici locali e specialità esotiche. A mezzogiorno si può fare uno spuntino presso una delle numerose e invitanti bancarelle e, d’estate, si può bere una birra nel Biergarten ai piedi del famoso albero della cuccagna dagli inconfondibili colori bavaresi. Se un tempo il Viktualienmarkt era un semplice mercato di contadini, è ormai da tempo molto apprezzato anche dai palati piú fini. Su una superficie totale di 22.000 m² si trovano 140 bancarelle che offrono fiori e piante, frutta, verdura, frutti esotici, selvaggina e pollame, uova, burro, miele, pesce, carne, salumie birra! Nonostante i cambiamenti che ha subito col passar del tempo, il Viktualienmarkt ha conservato la sua popolarità: ancor oggi è più che mai vera l’affermazione dei piú profondi conoscitori di Monaco, secondo ii quali al Viktualienmarkt il cuore di Monaco batte più forte.

title: Worth a visit
text: Next time I will not include breakfast at my hotel but rather eat here, there are the nicest things to eat and just walk around.

title: Mercato
text: Una via con un grande mercato che si trova svoltato l'angolo dopo Marienplatz. C'è la possibilità di acquistare qualsiasi cosa a poco prezzo come di fare un pranzo tipico con birra e salsiccia. Scegliete bene il chiosco in cui mangiare, sono stata sfortunata in quanto ho beccato un wurstel bruciato e di pessima qualità.

title: C'è di tutto
text: Effettivamente c'è di tutto e si mangia bene. Si può andare in qualunque chiosco, interessante anche quello del pesce. I tavoli fuori sono disponibili per tutti.

title: Lovely experience
text: Really a lovely walk through the Markt...had some gluwein and enjoyed the local vendors. Plenty of options and you can plan on a meal here as well.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: No coração da cidade
text: O tradicional mercado de Munique tem diversas opções gastronômicas e também artigos para o dia-a-dia do morador da cidade. Muito bacana para se conhecer como vivem os bávaros.

title: Molto di più di un "semplice" mercato
text: Accanto a Marienplatz si trova questo spettacolare mercato. Meraviglioso sia d'estate sia d'inverno.Ideale per mangiare, bere e fare shopping di prodotti tipici.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: No es para tirar cohetes
text: No está mal pero tampoco lo es para tirar cohetes. Hay un poco de todo, puestos para comprar comidas, regalos, puestos para degustar bebida y comida...La verdad bastante caro, nos cobraron en uno de los puesto 5€ por UNA salchicha con ketchup, una estafa total por lo que no volvimos a comer ahí

title: Pranzo al Viktualienmarkt
text: Ottimo posto, tipico bavarese, per bere eccezionale birra del posto e mangiare piatti tipici. Consiglio di passarci durante la vostra permanenza a Monaco.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Атмосферное место в центре города
text: Прекрасный , красивый атмосферный рынок в самом центре города. Замечательный выбор свежих овощей и фруктов, колбас и сыров, сувениров и цветов. Скопление кафешек разного уровня. В центре стоит майское дерево. На рынке много скульптур и фонтанчиков. Очень рекомендую посетить

title: Colori e profumi
text: Tappa immancabile per chi visita München! Colori e profumi dei prodotti del mercato e fantastiche zuppe calde.. anche se si deve sgomitare un po’ per riuscire a sedersi e degustare!
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Mπορείς να βρεις τα πάντα
text: Αν βρείτε χρόνο μην παραλείψετε να περάσετε μία βόλτα από την αγορά Viktualienmarkt. Βρίσκεται πίσω από την Marienplatz και την προσεγγίζεις σε λίγα λεπτά με τα πόδια. Είναι μία όμορφη, καλοστημένη και προσεγμένη αγορά παραδοσιακών προϊόντων όπου μπορείς να βρεις τα πάντα.  Από τοπικά εδέσματα όπως λουκάνικα και μπύρες, μέχρι λουλούδια και φρούτα σε λογικές τιμές. Mπορείς να απολαύσεις την μπύρα σου σε κάποια από τα πολλά παγκάκια της αγοράς.

title: Pretty normal street market, not exactly a tourist attraction
text: This was a pretty normal street market, selling lots of conventional vegetables, juice, cheese, street food, real food.  If you've ever been to a farmer's market, this won't blow your mind.

title: É um grande mercado aberto
text: Tem de tudo. Fomos em dezembro, então, tinha barracas de frutas, de comidas e até um mercado de natal. E a ótima cervejaria Der Pschorr!!

title: Der Bauch von München
text: Abgesehen vom Schlachthof findet sich nirgends in München eine solch authentische Auswahl heimischer Spezialitäten, hier natürlich gekrönt von den besten und ausgefallendsten Delikatessen aus aller Welt. In der Adventszeit schmuggeln sich allerlei Christkindlesmarktstände dazwischen, ob's das braucht, soll jeder für sich selbst entscheiden.

title: Tappa obbligatoria
text: Mercato all' aperto, in centro. Tutto molto interessante, dalla frutta esotica meravigliosa a quella di stagione, locali per mangiare, macellerie... fiorai, fruttivendoli, souvenirs, miele... Tutto molto bello.Unica pecca: i negozianti ti si rivolgono a tutti, a prescindere, in inglese: segno che è un posto estremamente turistico. Per lo stesso motivo, ho trovato che in generale non fossero "accoglienti" come in altre zone. Le commesse di Z*ra erano più empatiche... il che è tutto un dire.In ogni caso, da vedere e rivedere!!!

title: Γευσιγνωσίας το εγκώμιον .
text: Αποτελεί σημείο συνάντησης ανθρώπων με γούστα λεπτά και οικονομική επιφάνεια μεγάλη .Καθόλου φθηνή αγορά αλλά με προτάσεις ποιοτικότατες.  Πάνω από 140 καταστήματα με προϊόντα τοπικά , εγχώρια ή εξωτικά ( με είδη όμως φιρμάτα και επώνυμα ) . Φρούτα και λαχανικά,  λουλούδια , τσάι , καρυκεύματα , θαλασσινά , μπύρες , λουκάνικα και αλλαντικά , τυράκια , αρώματα και κρασιά .Ότι μπορεί να επιθυμήσει κανείς εδώ θα το βρει. Σε συσκευασίες δελεαστικότατες και σε τιμές για βαλάντια δυνατά. Πάντως αξίζει .

title: Small but Worthwhile
text: This Christmas market is about different than the rest in that there isn’t much Christmas stuff to browse. Half the booths are food stalls and the others sell clothing or knives, swords, etc. Check it out if you have some time but I wouldn’t go out of your way for it.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Obligatorio
text: De lo mejor de la ciudad, un lugar con encanto propio y digno de visitar más de un día para poder provar los distintos sabores que se presentan en formato de Street Food. Muy curioso y gran calidad de la comida.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Schöner Markt zum Schlemmen und Einkaufen
text: Der Viktualienmarkt lohnt zum Sightseeing als auch für einen Imbiss ein wenig außerhalb des Einkaufstrubels. Nicht zu vergessen - hier kann man auch toll Lebensmittel Einkaufen.

title: un mercado pequeño estupendo
text: El mercado es muy variado..tiendas de especies, de vegetales, quesos, carnes, artesanía.. una maravilla.. y mucha historia

title: Lovely market close to Marienplatz
text: It took two minutes to walk here from Marienplatz and so glad we found it. Lovely market selling all things Christmassy but also surrounded by shops and restaurants. Amazing flower/gift shop which is worth finding.

title: Great place to hang out :-)
text: Great market place in the city center where you can find various food, fruits, vegetables, chocolate, honey, and the tee decors before Christmas.

title: Mercato
text: Classico mercato cittadino come si trova in Italia. Espositori  di vario livello e bancarelle gastronomiche molto ricercate. Si gira comodamente ed è  a pochi minuti dalla piazza principale.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Que lugar especial
text: Nos quase 8 dias em Munich passei no Viktualienmarkt praticamente todos os dias. Tomava minha cerveja e comia algo delicioso vendido nas infinitas "lojinhas"/restaurantes que compõem o mercado. O lugar é agradabilíssimo e super movimentado, porém sempre tem um lugar para sentar-se. É um local que deve ser visitado quando se está em Munich.

title: Backerliesl at Viktualienmarkt
text: One of the very good food stops to make at Viktualienmarkt is the Backerliesl (Bakery) situated between Munchner Suppenkuche (Soup Kitchen) and Kaffeerosterei (Coffee Roaster). This bakery has been at the market since 1950. During our visit, we bought a bag of coconut macaroons and almond cinnamon stars that were both very good. Both of which tasted very delicious. These were great little snacks we enjoyed back in our hotel during the evenings. Would happily purchase these again during future visits to the market.

title: Sometimes I get tired of pig !
text: Close to the centre of Munich lies the viktualienmarkt,  worth at least an hour or two of your time. Lots of interesting stalls, fresh food, snacks and,... Nordzee.Now I love pig as much as anyone, but I’d been in Austria and Germany for 9 days.  Pretty well pork for breakfast, lunch and dinner.  I had to declare the pig “a vegetable” to keep those at home content.  Eat your vegetables” !I found Nordzee. They’re all over Germany,  I thought it was sort of a piscatoral MacDonalds.  Not so,... absolutely fresh fish and boy oh boy was it good, and not expensive. For the rest of my 29 day adventure it was 3 days of pig, then one day of fish.  Someday I shall return and do it all over.      Dave

title: Not to be missed. Great food. Deacadent.
text: We went to the Viktualienmarkt at least 3 times in our short visit to Munich in July. Area is around a square walking distance from Marienplatz. There are a variety of restaurant, produce stores, handcrafted jellys and cafés. It's very nice and worth a visit.

title: Shop, Eat, and Have A Beer
text: No matter the season; walk the market. Stop by one of the Butcher Shops and grab a fresh sausage or leberkäs for lunch; take a seat at the Biergarten, have a cold bier with your lunch; and enjoy the outdoors of München. Look out above for pigeons as you relax, as they may drop a special “treat” on you...

title: Parada obrigatória
text: Uma feira a céu aberto, com comidas, artesanato, cerveja, frutas variadas...tudo muito delicioso, num espaço grande para sentar e se deliciar com os queijos, frutos do mar, pães e patês. Vale a visita durante o dia, seja pra um passeio ou pra fazer a refeição.

title: immer wieder gerne
text: komme ich hierher. Ein kurzer Spaziergang, einpaar Einkäufe. Es ist einfach ein Stück München. Hier findet jeder etwas und es ist immer ein Erlebnis.

title: Recado central de Munich al aire libre
text: Interesante pasear por los puestos de comida típica.Hay mesas y bancos para poder comer y beber lo que compres, incluso un puesto de salchichas buenísimas.Lo encuentras sin problema pues pasas por él, sin querer.

title: Precios absurdos
text: Un mercado de comida sin más, donde los precios son desorbitados sin sentido algunoCosas curiosas para comer pero alejados de la realidad Al aire libre se hace difícil disfrutar con el frío q hace
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Рождество в Мюнхене
text: Второй раз за последние 4 года был в Мюнхене и обязательно посещаю этот местный рынок. Очень вкусные и горячие супы в одном из торговых павильонов, куда заходят не только туристы, но и множество местных жителей.

title: 시장

title: Interesting market
text: Closeby to the main square, it is the Viktualienmarket, that offers a lot of different food from all kinds. Everything that's typical in Germany is able to be found here. Recommend to walk around it.

title: Yes to this!
text: I was in Munich for the Christmas markets which were all quite lovely, but this market had a completely different vibe - much more authentic, less touristy, and a glimpse of life as a local.  The quality of products for sale was top notch, and you can find anything from fresh flowers, wine, cheese, fish, and produce.   Absolutely go there!!!

title: Walked around and took in the sights and sounds
text: Visited at Christmas time, which was a beautiful atmosphere. So many nice things to see, sausage shops and cheese booths, florists, and various others. It is definitely worth the visit complete with Maypole that I believe must stay up year around.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Worth a visit
text: Gifts, fresh food, dessert, coffee...a fun place to get a snack. Good overview of food options. Beer garden on one end.

title: Fun Fun Fun
text: Loved our visit here with showcasing foods flowers and holiday ornaments.  We were here in the evening and it was bustling with activity.

title: Varias opções gastronômicas.
text: O mercado e o Biergarten são a céu aberto e o comércio não abre aos domingos. Se estiver chovendo não será a melhor opção de passeio. É vizinho à Marienplatz,a sudeste e fácil acesso caminhando. A estação de U e S-Bahn e mais próxima é a Marienplatz. Existe desde 1807. Há panificadoras(Bäckerei),açougues(Fleisch Metzgerei),charcutarias (Feinkost),chocolateria,delicatéssen e queijarias. Há bancas de frutas e verduras. O padrão de qualidade é europeu. Os queijos são alemães,franceses,italianos e espanhóis. Os embutidos também. Conservas italianas e espanholas.Lojas de souvenir. As peixarias ficam mais adiante da Nordsee. Servem frutos do mar de acordo com o menu. O Eataly está ali perto e a Casa Italia na Westenriederstrasse são ótimas opções para comprar produtos italianos. O Biergarten é democrático e basta dividir o espaço gratuito com outras pessoas.  Ótimo para provar as iguarias compradas nas bancas ou quiosques. Misto de alemães e estrangeiros. Há mesas reservadas para os clientes dos restaurantes. Dividimos nossa mesa com um casal russo. Escolha sua cerveja no quiosque(estavam disponíveis Hacker-Pschorr Kellerbier,Dunkel e Paulaner),pague no ato e leve as canecas para a mesa. Se não me engano a opção de cervejaria muda a cada 6 semanas. Recomendo para quem curte passear por atrações gastronômicas.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Bello e impossibile
text: Ai piedi di Marien Platz trovi il mercato, il sabato all'ora di pranzo era strapieno e impossibile riuscire a mangiare qualche cosa, se non facendo code interminabili. A dire il vero i banchi propri del mercato non sono rimasti molti. Ci sono chioschi dove mangiare, se ci riesci, e alcune strutture in muratura che vendono alimentari dai vini , ai formaggi agli insaccati. e qualche classico banco del mercato.Ogni tanto spunta una statua dedicata a qualche personaggio caratteristico della Monaco dei tempi passati. Al pomeriggio invece ci trovi lo stesso un sacco di gente che beve, intorno sempre posti dove mangiare e bere. Finalmente una mattina feriale, ti puoi muovere tranquillamente per il mercato e apprezzarlo maggiormente, comunque merita.

title: Shoppingtour
text: Der Markt ist wirklich empfehlenswert, wenn man ein leidenschaftlicher Hobby Koch ist. Man findet hier wirklich alles.

title: Bello!
text: Davvero bello, colorato e al centro di Monaco. Si trova di tutto e di più, dal cibo agli addobbi di Natale. I migliori brezel in giro e tanto altro! Consigliato!

title: A great way to end our trip!
text: I was here with my brother on a sunday in June and the majority of the market, which looked impressive was unfortunately closed, however there was a event going on and one with a real atmosphere! On offer, quality traditional german food and beer with live music and dancing and it was a fantastic experience! We got a real sense of german tradition here. It was packed, but we managed to share a table with an american couple. We ordered hotdogs and beers and they went down a treat! The beer particularly hit the spot! We stayed for a couple of hours and would have stayed longer, if we didn't have to leave. One day i will return when the market is open! and hopefully this event is on again!

title: A Top Street Market in the world!
text: Food: 5/5Service: 4/5Cleanliness: 5/5Decor & Style: 5/5This is an outdoor market that has a lot to offer, and by far has the best street pork I have ever had in my life! With fast access to beer and street food one can easily spend many, many hours here. They even have fresh juicing here as well and many nick nacks to buy. The markets and streets are very clean and looks beautiful and I can easily say it's probably my top 3 street market of all time!

title: Sehr empfehlenswert!!!
text: Tolle Atmosphäre, super nette Mitarbeiter an den Ständen, unglaublich viele Leckereien!!! Ein MUSS in München

title: Красоту надо искать
text: В преддверии Хеллоуина казалось, что на Виктуаленмаркет должно быть явнте ощущение праздника. В принципе, мы нашли красивые зарисовки, яркие краски, тыквы, цветы и сухостой, но единой праздничной концепции не было. Прямо за Собором Св.Петра.

title: Leuke markt
text: Midden in het centrum is een kleine markt. Hier kun je allerlei dingen kopen en wat eten en drinken. Dit moet je zeker gezien hebben.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: سوق المنتجات الزراعية التقليدية
text: حتى الآن ، يأتي تجار البقالة إلى الساحة ، التي تقع على بعد خطوات قليلة من مبنى البلدية. هنا يأتي سكان المدينة الذين يرغبون في شراء الخضروات والفواكه الطازجة. فرصة عظيمة للسياح ليشعروا بأنفسهم في أحذية أحد السكان المحليين ، يسألون عن هدايا الطبيعة.

title: Great atmosphere
text: We really enjoyed our visit to this market. There is a great atmosphere. Good food, loved the vendors selling fesh squeezed juices and smoothies.

title: Große Auswahl, frische Produkte - hier ist für jeden etwas dabei
text: Reichhaltiges Angebot von Fisch, Fleisch, Obst, Gemüse, Käse, Suppen in allen Variationen.Nach einem Rundgang kann man sich im Biergarten bei einer Maß stärken und das bunte Treiben beobachten. Gehört neben dem englischen Garten und dem Hofbräuhaus einfach zu Pflichtprogramm - zurecht.Komme in jedem Fall wieder

title: Visit at mid town market
text: Near the Marian platz there is a market where we can find fresh fruits and vegetables. There us also all kind if cheese and meats and flowers. Also alps hand artisans wood artifacts, glass figurines. And of course lot of places to eat and drink.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Il caratteristico mercato della città
text: Fate un salto al Viktualienmarkt, a pochi passi da Marienplatz, magari per pranzo, sono infatti presenti molti posticini dove mangiare e ovviamente bere ottima birra. Negozietti e bancarelle con prodotti tipici, frutta, spezie e fiori. Merita sicuramente una visita.

title: Härlig marknadsplats
text: Viktualienmarkt ligger ett stenkast från Marienplatz. Du kan köpa allehanda livsmedel som frukt, korvar och bakverk där. Du kan också ta en öl med Bretzel eller ta en restaurang i närheten. En favoritplats i Munchen.

title: Für jeden Geschmack etwas dabei
text: Zur Brotzeit dort gewesen und in der Suppenküche eine sehr leckere Zwischenmahlzeit gefunden!Gerne Wieder, hier findet jeder etwas das Ihn anspricht!
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Nicht mit dem Naschmarkt in Wien vergleichbar,
text: Kein Vergleich zum Naschmarkt in Wien. Angebotsvielfalt und Atmosphäre ist der Markt in Wien noch weit voraus. Aber trotzdem mit dem Ambiente und Auswahl in München zufrieden.

title: Ein Highlight in München
text: Der Viktualienmarkt in München ist für den Besucher wirklich ein Erlebnis. Es werden an den Ständen unzählig viele frische Lebensmittel in sehr guter Qualität angeboten, die man auch teilweise gleich kosten kann. Es ist mein muss die gesehen zu haben.

title: Immer wieder gerne.
text: Wir freuen uns immer , wenn wir in München sind und den Viktualienmarkt besuchen können. Die tolle Auswahl an Spezialitäten haben uns sehr angetan.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: A great surprise
text: We really enjoyed our visit to this market. There is a great atmosphere and so many good food around.We really liked all those kiosks serving foods and drinks (notably smoothies)Really a great place to come to relax

title: Open market
text: You will walk through the market as it is very close to the main square. Many food stalls. Must visit? No.

title: Market with everything
text: What a neat market. Can purchase all sorts of food from sausages to fruits and vegetables to olive oil. Several flower stands plus lots of places to sit down and eat. Was raining when I went so not overly crowded.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Rigtigt hyggeligt sted
text: Er man turist i centrum af München i godt vejr, må man ikke snyde sig selv får denne oplevelse. Et stort udendørs marked med et hav af boder med alle mulige dejlige delikatesser og lækre snacks.

title: Must See in München
text: Natürlich gehört der Viktualienmarkt zu den absoluten Hotspots in München. Neben dem ständigen Marktplatz in der Altstadt gibt es viele Lokalitäten, die zum Verweilen einladen.

title: Hustling market place
text: Loads of different market stalls selling various wares. There are also a few places (cafes) dotted around where you can have a beer/get something to eat whilst observing everyone do their thing.

title: Interesting market
text: Large open air market selling many different types of food and drink both to take home or eat there. Lively atmosphere. Worth a visit.

title: Great market in the centre of town
text: This market is always busy as it has a great selection of Bavarian and German food for sale and to eat.Its almost like an open outdoor  beer hall!Plenty of seats and food choices.

title: Hyvä läpileikkaus Saksalaiseen ruokaan ja juomaan
text: Viktualienmarket on paikka mistä löydät tyypillisiä saksalaisia ruokia ja juomia. Sekä käsitöitä ja, vihanneksia ym. Tunnelma on lämmin ja paikalle on löytäneet niin turistit kuin paikallisetkin ihmiset. Sieltä on helppo käydä nappaamassa vaikka bratwursti evääksi ja jatkaa kaupungilla kiertelyä. Paikalle on helppo löytää Marienplazilta.

title: Imperdible
text: Ideal para una recorrida al aire libre por sus variados puestos con distintos tipos de artículos: artesanías, flores, plantas, quesos, embutidos, etc. Centralmente  ubicado hay un espacio grande, también al aire libre, con bancos y mesas en el que descansar, comer y tomar una rica cerveza. Me encantó el lugar porque te permite todo eso al tiempo que puedes conocer otro aspecto de los muniqueses y sus costumbres.

title: Immer ein Besuch wert
text: Belebter Markt im Zentrum von München. Vergleichbar mit dem Naschmarkt in Wien (nur halt deutlich kleiner)

title: Доверяй, но проверяй!
text: Не слишком большой в масштабах других городов рынок, довольно приятный, колоритный. title: went three times
text: first tiem I went to this it was after a pretty heavy duty day at Oktoberfest; met my family and friends and someone thrust a leberkase and bread sandwich into my hands....and that's all i remember.  This time I went with my wife, we went 3 times.  First we just ducked under an eave during a rainstorm at an unnamed place and got a fantastic wurst and fries.  The last 2 times were at the Kaffee Rosterei, which I have reviewed separately....and man, they were both very good.  You can get almost anything from takeaway to sit down, beer, coffee, vegetables, flowers, meats, and great cheese.  I think it is best used as a place for quick meals or snacks while touring the rest of the city.

title: 日曜日でもビアガーデンは大賑わい ★ Viktualienmarkt
text: ここの市場は日曜日休業であることは事前に把握していたがどんな場所なのか見に行ったところびっくり仰天、ビアガーデンとその周辺だけは日曜日でも大賑わいだった。長椅子・長テーブル席がセルフサービス席のようで0.５リットルジョッキビール（たしか4～5€）や揚げ物などのおつまみで十分に楽しめた。ただドイツ独特のこの長テーブル席は、席の間隔が狭く背もたれもなく、野外とはいえ周りにはタバコの煙もただよい日本との文化の違いが感じられる。なおトイレは東側店舗の地下にある（有料）。その後　市場全体を散策してみたが当然ながらビアガーデン付近以外の全ての物販店は休業していた。

text: Ein toller Platz mit sehr vielen Ständen mit unterschiedlichen Essen.  Hier drüben zu gehen ist sowohl für das Auge als auch für den kulinarischen Genuss toll. Empfehlenswert

title: Don't miss the biergarten.
text: This is a great market place and very large. It is on the other side of Marienplatz. I have always wanted to go to a genuine German Biergarten. This was certainly a nice one. Great place to meet people...and the beer was great too. Nothing better than sitting under the trees on a nice September day. It was a great start to our Oktoberfest weekend. If you wanted food, there was food there as well.

title: Don't miss this!
text: I had no clue how large the whole market area spanned.  It was great to wander around but best of all was the beer garden in the middle.  A great place to slow down and grab a cold beer.

title: Un mercato per turisti, ma frequentato anche dalla gente del posto
text: Non si può non andare a vedere il Viktualienmarkt a Monaco di Baviera. Pensavamo fosse solo per turisti, ma ci vanno tutti: la qualià dei prodotti agricoli é molto buona.  E tante possibilità di bere buonissima birra.

title: Meeting Place
text: A beer under the trees and watching the world walk by. The atmosphere here is far more pleasant than the beer hall that attracts so many tourists. You really feel like you are mingling with the locals. Look up before you take that empty bench. It may be vacant because of pigeon droppings.

title: Slice of life
text: Viktualienmarkt has a superb ambience - lots of stalls, lots of people with a range of emotions (some relaxing over beer, some busy shopping) and is located in the vicinity of Marienplatz. Lovely place to get a good view of the various slices of life of the city!

title: Great location for lunch and a beer.
text: This is a pine fun place to stroll around. There is a large beer garden outside in the center and you can purchase food from one of the many shops surrounding the beer garden. The beer is sold by one of Munich’s seven breweries which rotate. This is primarily visited by locals, and you end up sharing a picnic table with other individuals you won’t know.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Excelente passeio durante o dia
text: Lugar agradável para comer alguma coisa e descansar. Tem uma área grande de alimentação. Vale a visita.

title: A great break from touring the churches and museums
text: You can certainly just cruise through here and ogle it as a novelty. However, it really merits stopping for an hour or two for either lunch or some drinks and snacks. Skip the one-stop places where you can get a beer and sandwich and take the time to browse the various shops for a selection of cheeses, meats, breads and other goodies before making your way to the tables of the central biergarten to enjoy your spoils. It’s so cheap and fun that you may find yourself returning. It can be crowded at times, but it's usually easier to squeeze into a table here than to try to get seated at an actual restaurant - and you'll get to meet the locals!

title: Ein facettenreicher Markt...
text: ...mit unglaublicher Vielfalt und lokalen Spezialitäten. Von weissem Trüffel, über hausgemachte Suppe bis hin zu Spirituosen und exotischen Früchten ist hier hier alles zu finden.Dieser Ort gehört definitiv auf die Liste jedes Reisenden!

title: Leuke markt
text: Heerlijke markt om overheen te dwalen. Prachtige kraampjes en goeie vibe. Leuk om op het terras van nabijgelegen café uit te kijken over de markt.

title: Buen sitio para vivir el Munich en la calle
text: Es una pplaza a pocos metros de la Marienplatz, llena de puestos de frutas, quesos, carnicerías, flores, artesanía, cervecerías, todo mezclado pero sin sensación de caos. ÇUn placer perderte por entre los puestos, degustar una cerveza en uno de los bancos corridos de la plaza o un zumo natural y muy variado.

title: Seightseeing in Munique.
text: When you are busy sightseeing in the city of Munchen, it is a must to take the time to slender on the  “Viktualienmarkt” who is at only a few steps from the “Marienplatz” away. This is a a daily food market and a square in the center of the city. The origen of the “Viktualienmarkt” is from an original “Farmers Market” into a popular market for “Gourmets”. In an area who is covering aproximatively 22,000m2 (240,000 sq ft), 140 stalls and shops offer flowers, exotic fruit, game, poultry, spices, cheese, fish, juices and so on. Most stalls and shops are open during the official opening hours (Monday to Saturday 8 a.m. until 8 p.m.); but the Biergarten doesn't open until 9 a.m. Many stalls close at 6 p.m., before the standard closing time. There are special opening hours for flower shops, bakeries and restaurants.

title: Fun to experience, closed Sunday nights!
text: I enjoyed the atmosphere and food and shops on Saturday. I went back for one of the delicious-looking sausages on Sunday. Only one stand out of 100 was open, so it was a disappointment, personally. Do go , though, it's close to all the good stuff

title: Un incontournable !!!
text: Vraiment un lieu extraordinaire, il y a un marché et au milieu des tables avec des banc où l’on peu boire une bière sous les arbres tous en dégustant les plats du marché.Il y règne une très bonne ambiance et un atmosphère typiquement Bavarois.Un lieu immanquable si vous passez à Munich.

title: Huge fun even in the pouring rain
text: Walking round a crowded open air market under an umbrella is far from ideal, but this such a feast for the eyes and the stomach it didn’t seem to matter. The stalls offer a wide variety of food, drink and gifts, plus there are quite a few cafes and bars where you can relax. Of course the prices are high, but you can’t expect anything else in such a premium tourist location as this, just off the iconic Marienplatz. Allow plenty of time to go round this market, there’s so much to see and enjoy.

title: Outdoor market
text: This was a fabulous place to explore and find great gifts and wonderful food.  The food vendors had fresh fruit, vegetables and meats.  We made multiple stops and ate as we walked.  I found the best gifts at a garden store.  Many people were seated outdoors enjoying the weather and the beer.

text: Ωραια αγορα πισω απο τη Marienplatz να παρεις οτι θες. Τοπικα εδεσματα οπως λουκανικα κ μπυρες οτι θες σε λογικες τιμες.Ειδικα αν εχει ηλιο καθεσαι στα παγκακια καιο απολαμβανεις τη μπυρα σου.

title: definitely walk through Viktualienmarkt - you will likely find a great souvenir or snack!
text: Definitely walk through Viktualienmarkt for shopping and eats. We enjoyed the varied shopping booths from authentic bavarian goods and snacks to more touristy stops.  It is great window shopping and you will likely find a great souvenir or snack!

title: Muy interesante
text: Plaza encantadora llena de puestecillos de flores y artesanía, rodeada de montones de carnicerías donde comprar carne y la mayor variedad de salchichas. Si el tiempo acompaña, hay terrazas al aire libre donde comer o tomar una cerveza. A un paso de Marienplatz, no te lo pierdas
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Mercadillo popular
text: Mercado concurrido, gran variedad de puestos. Visita obligada. Se puede estar una mañana o media... Y comer allí.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Varied foods
text: Carried fruit and vegetables. Had a beer garden and several restaurants in an near. It will take an hour to see all offered.

title: Sharing the Viktualienmarkt with a Friend
text: Whenever I visit Munich - usually a couple of times a year - I make it a practice of visiting the Viktualienmarkt, weather permitting.  In September I was in Munich and a friend from the States met me there.  He had never been in the Viktualienmarkt so I thought I'd expose him to some Bavarian culture.  He was amazed as the number of people, the food items, alcoholic beverages, and craft items for sale.  We had a couple of beers and engaged in "people watching."  It was an enjoyable couple of hours.

text: 10.4.19Being born in South Philly I always compare markets to Reading Terminal Market with that being a 5.This one is 4/5.the Doctor Hit me with some BIG LOVE ❤️💕 and a helpful VOTE!Written in Munich GERMANY 🇩🇪 10.4.19  the Doc!

title: A Nice Market
text: We wandered through the market on our first and second day of touring Munich-it was absolutely packed because of  Oktoberfest so navigating  was a bit difficult. There are plenty of stalls selling every imaginable German food-from schnitzel to sausages and everything in between. You'll find beer and wine as well plus sweets.We grabbed a sausage with kraut at one stand for a few Euros-it was very good. There are plenty of fruit, artists and booze stands as well. I would have liked to walk through it on a non-Oktoberfest weekend because it would have been less frantic. It is just a short walk from the Marienplatz and well worth the few minutes walk.

title: Il mercato di Monaco di Baviera
text: È il mercato di strada di Monaco di Baviera, non lontano dall'Isartor. È ricco, molto colorato e multiculturale.

title: A Must See In Munich
text: This is a quintessential place in Munich and a must see for anyone, even just passing through. It's in central Munich and offers a glimpse at folk arts (such as flower arrangements, woodland critters carefully crafted from local materials, and the ever present gingerbread hearts), food (such as pretzels, cheeses, produce, butcher, seafood, and schnitzel/sausages/etc.), and f course beer! There's a great bier garten (aka beer garden) in the market that allows you to sit, people watch, and enjoy some of the local cuisine.

title: Love It!!!
text: What a wonderful setting for the day.  Amazing food markets, bier garten, eateries and cafes.Even on a Monday 1pm the beer garden is packed.  Lederhosen sand durndells everywhere!

title: Marché 100% bavarois
text: Magnifique marché vendant des produits 100% bavarois. Authenticité et qualité. Quel bonheur de s’y promener. Véritable joyau à ne pas manquer!

title: Great place in inner city
text: This is more than a market. Of course you can buy all kinds of things but there are also restaurants and coffee shops. A good place to sit down for a while and people watch.

title: A very interesting market
text: There are lots of goods being sold in this market from fish to veggies as well as locally made souvenirs. A very diverse marketplace to wander around and perhaps find that special gift or delightful food item you are looking for. Well worth the visit just to window shop as well.

title: A must visit for Munich
text: Lovely, although small scale, markets. But large and lively beer garden. Traditional maypole. Best beer garden experience we found in Munich.

title: A wonderful market
text: Just a few steps from Marienplatz this is a must do. Walk through the food stalls or sit in the bier garden for lunch. Closes early so it’s not a dinner area.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Good place to try local produce
text: As it was raining when I visited I didn't spend much time there however, it was nice to take a look around and try some of the local produce. There are shops selling a variety of salads which would have been nice to enjoy as a picnic. The shops also sell various herbs and spices which you can try and will also provide instructions on how to mix these.

text: Habe an einer geführten Tour durch den Viktualienmarkt teilgenommen ...hier Gan es an 5 Stationen Verköstigungen...alles sehr lecker eine unvorstellbare riesige Auswahl ..und in meinen Augen nicht teuer. text: Mercato ordinato, non rumoroso, che si trova di tutto ed è piacevole passeggiarvi. Io avevo la camera dell’albergo che dava su la piazza è devo dire che era bello la mattina vedere i ritmi del mercato. Ma vale la pena andare e fare una bella passeggiata.

text: Gosto muito de locais assim.... Mistura de gente, sabores e aromas. Artesanato, souvenires, comidas típicas (e cerveja) para todos os bolsos e gostos, frutas e verduras. Enfim, um mercadão ao ar livre. Há cerca de 400 m da Marienplatz

title: Cerveja, comida e souvenir!
text: O Viktualienmarkt é muito legal! Fomos na época da oktoberfest e estava lotado, mas arrumamos um lugarzinho! Lá as mesas têm grandes bancos de madeira e são compartilhadas. Compramos cerveja e salsicha para almoçar. No entorno das mesas existem várias tendas com souvenirs. Delícia de lugar!!

title: Best place for quick and cheap lunch
text: Best place for quick and cheap lunch in Munich. Wide variety of fresh produce to take home for dinner

title: Tiene muchos puntos a su favor
text: Mercado de productos locales, restaurantes y punto de encuentro para mucha gente. Si hace un día soleado es obligatorio pararte a comer o tomar una cerveza en sus mesas.Además los precios de los comercios que se encuentran en él son muy competitivos.

title: Food food food 🥘
text: Very cute market with lots of variety of foods ...If you like continental foods and lots of it here’s your place.Cheeses everywhere deli with gherkins and yes you can buy just one so many things to buy, there is places you can seat and eat if you prefer or just grab a seat some nibbles and a beer and enjoy under the tree. title: Fun variety of food

Ho trovato anche un angolo dedicato ai prodotti italiani e precisamente dalla Sardegna. Sono tutti molto gentili e cordiali.

title: Schöner Markt!
text: Der Viktualienmarkt ist ein muss für jeden der in München ist! Es gibt eine Riesen Auswahl an Essen und Getränken und vieles davon ist regional.

title: Comida, música e arte
text: Uma praça com muitos artigos para serem degustados, apreciados e comprados. Artesanato, comida típica, música e alegria. Munique é deslumbrante!

title: Sprawling 200-year-old market

Immediately behind the market there are some eateries with food and beer, and many tables where you can sit and eat. Loved this place. If I lived nearby, I would go here every day for groceries or sometimes a snack.

title: Mercado sensacional
text: Mercado a céu aberto, muitas opções de comida boa, muita cerveja, mesas partilhadas, super astral. Recomendo!

title: Fresh vegetables! Cheese! Meats! Flowers!
text: After too many restaurant and hotel meals it is so nice to find fresh food. There are a variety of stalls selling food and small gifts. The shopkeepers are helpful and most speak English and when they don’t and my German falls short, we manage through pointing and it all works out just fine. A suggestion: if you are buying flowers late in season (September), avoid the imported roses and go for the locally grown dahlias—they are fresh and beautiful.

title: Muenchener Tradition , ein Genuss fuer Magen und Augen !
text: Es ist egal wie oft wir ein paar Tage in Muenchen verbringen, der Besuch des Viktualienmarktes gehoert dazu  ! Die Vielfalt der Obst -Gemuesesorten  , alles knackig frisch , die verschiedenen Staende mit Kaese und der schattige Platz unter den Bauemen , um ein richtig gutes Bier zu geniessen , ist sooo fantastisch . title: Do Not MIss This Great Venue - So Close to Marienplatz
text: We were bringing family to Munich and Germany for the first time, and after they experienced Marienplatz, the Rathaus, Hofbrauhaus, etc. we brought them to the nearby viktualienmarkt.  Great choice!!!  Lots of shopping options, local vendors, and we all were able to make purchases of local meats and cheese, crafts, and wines/schapps that we only saw closer to the Austrian border.  Wow!  So many options; so much great food and beverage.  A must see and visit.

title: Bohemian area
text: Great market space in the dining area of Munich. There are food stalls aplenty and it is a marvellous option for spending a happy hour wandering between the stalls looking for bargains or chasing the perfect taste experience.

title: Einer der schönsten Märkte
text: Vielfältiges Angebot, ganz frische Ware, jede Menge zum Naschen und auch ganz ausgefallene Lebensmittelangebote - von regional bis international. Ich lebe seit über 40 Jahren in München und es ist immer wieder ein Highlight für mich den Markt zu besuchen.

title: So many delicious food
text: I spent most of my time in this market. I love the variety of food and people you will find there. The Biergarten is fun and completely authentic. The prices are reasonable an the food so delicious. You can fun fresh fruit juices made as your order. The soups are great and gives you a nice break without making you feel too full. This. Is a must stop!
