title: Great food choices
text: The market has everything for good food. This is a great place to visit and understand Bavarian culture and food.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Блошиный рынок
text: Классный рыночек. Овощи, фрукты, колбасы, сыры,... Напоминает рынок в какой-нибудь деревне. Тихо спрятан внутри квартала

title: Lovely Service at Airport Eatery
text: If you're flying out of K gates at Munich stop here. Mehmeti is the man who works the food stall. He is incredibly polite and friendly. He made out between flight meal a bit nicer.

title: guten appetit...
text: Der Viktualienmarkt im absoluten Zentrum der Weltstadt mit Herz besteht seit mehr als 200 Jahren und bietet ein riesiges Angebot an Lebensmitteln und Blumen. Die Marktbuden sind fest installiert und sind täglich mit Ausnahme von Sonn- und Feiertag geöffnet. Von Montag bis Samstag 8 Uhr bis spätestens 20 Uhr mit Ausnahmen. Darüber hinaus kann man in den Biergärten relativ günstig bayrische Spezialitäten bekommen, wobei teilweise auch mitgebrachte (auf dem Markt gekaufte) Lebensmittel gegessen werden dürfen. Die Kunden und Besucher kommen leicht miteinander ins Gespräch und man fühlt sich fast wie dazugehörig.In nächster Nähe befinden sich mehrere Parkhäuser.

title: So many good choices
text: We really enjoyed checking the market out. It is spread over a large area with plenty of room between the stalls. All of the items for sale look fresh and delicious. Everything from fruits and Vegetables to cheese, meats, and touristy trinkets. Several good restaurants in the area and a large open air eating area. We wished we had something like this in our home town.

title: Muito Agradável
text: O ambiente é muito agradável e a comida vendida pelas barracas ou lojas são muito gostosas e com bom preço. São vendidos diversos tipos de comida e cerveja de ótima qualidade. O único senão é achar lugar nas mesas, que sempre estão completas, e o espaço entre elas, que é muito estreito, dificultando a passagem e sendo muito difícil sentar nas costas de outra pessoa. De resto, é muito bom comer por lá.

title: 掘り出し物が見つかるマーケット
text: 公園内に店が並ぶマーケットです。品ぞろえが充実しており、買い物好きの人は見て歩くだけでも楽しいと思います。掘り出し物が見つかるかもしれません。お店の人たちも楽しそうに販売していました。油断するといっぱい買ってしまいそう。
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Da farci un giretto!
text: Mercato molto caratteristico, dove ti puoi sedere e degustare specialità, comprare souvenir (dal cibo, ai profumi, oggetti vari ......), tutto sistemato molto bene dove si mischiano profumi e colori. Certo non è paragonabile al mercato di Barcellona, ma questo ha il suo perchè!

title: A Wonderful Place for a Wander!
text: I had two occasions to visit this wonderful market recently, and if I was still in Munich, I daresay I would be there on a regular basis.  Fruits, vegetables, jams, wines, olive oils, teas and so much more!  Both times I was here with my roommates.  The first time, I found some lovely herbal tea.  We were in the mood for a sweet, so we found a small coffee shop to sit for a while.  The plum pastry I had was delightful!  On my second visit, I met another roommate there.  Quite literally, the first thing she did when she saw me was rave about these AMAZING strawberries she'd found.  After tasting one, I too, was raving!  We wandered until she found the source of the berries, and I bought my own.  The wonderful lady at the booth then proffered raspberries.  Upon tasting them, we each bought some.  I love berries, and raspberries are my favorite, closely followed by strawberries.  These berries were the best I've ever had!  I love open-air markets, and the next time I find myself in Munich, I will be back to the Viktualienmarkt!

title: Trh se vším možným
text: Velice zajímavé tržiště, které nabízí rozmanitý výběr, od koupě nejrůznějších potravin až po řemeslnické výrobky. Jen se připravte na jednu věc a to jsou ceny, protože za všechno možné chcou tady opravdu pálky ale věřím že nikdo neodejde s prázdnou, jelikož to člověka prostě nenechá aby odešel a přitom si z toho všemožného výběru nic nekoupil.

title: Mercato comune
text: Un comune mercato con specialità locali . Non tra i migliori che ho visitato. La zona é più carina la sera per i numerosi locali  per cenare

title: Un mercatino nel cuore di una metropoli
text: Imperdibile in una visita a Monaco. Per gli amanti dello street food un'occasione per mangiare o comprare prodotti tipici bavaresi e non (si trovano anche frutti esotici, formaggi francesi e spezie orientali). L'atmosfera é quella tipica bavarese con tavoli da condividere in compagnia. Ottimo occasione per mettere insieme l'amore per il cibo e nuove conoscenze.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Típico
text: Es un lugar fresco y relajado para comer una salchicha y beber cerveza a precios asequibles. Cuando fuimos no había locales de artesanías abiertos pero las salchichas y las cervezas son muuy ricas y no tan caras como en Marian Platz. Cerveza 4 euros. Salchicha con pan 4 euros + 2 euros de col agria

title: Famous
text: The famous Viktualienmarkt with a history that is centuries old is an endless food Market in the heart of the city. Many vendors benches are full of flowers,  fruits, fish, juices, cheeses, meats, wines and more.

title: Mercado de 1807
text: O Viktualienmarkt é um mercado permanente de alimentos que fica na parte da cidade antiga de Munique. O Viktualienmarkt funciona desde  1807 todos os dias, exceto aos domingos e feriados. Além de ser um ótimo lugar para se comer, aqui você encontra os melhores bretzels da cidade, ótimos cafés, suco natural e claro, um bom jardim de cerveja.

title: Per pranzo
text: Mangiare un boccone e bere qualcosa di fresco per spezzare la visita nella città nelle giornate calde.Ci sono delle belle bancherelle.

title: Immer einen Besuch wert
text: Tolle Angebotsvielfalt und Qualität, bei gutem Wetter auch sehr schön zum Verweilen. Mein Favorit sind die leckeren Gemüsedrinks.

title: Bello ma non indispensabile
text: Visitato quale luogo censito dalle guide, è più che altro un punto da vedere eventualmente per una colazione o o cena, ma non contiene in sé particolarità tali da considerarlo alla strega degli altri luoghi di interesse della città. Va bene una passeggiata in un itinerario.

title: Bavarian culture
text: A wonderful open market with various kiosks, plenty of local goods, fish, meat, cheese, teas, flowers, vegetables and so many other things. We really enjoyed. A nice lunch brake, a quick coffee or just shopping the experience is great.

title: Mercado tradicional
text: Mercado tradicional dónde tomar algo o comprar alguna de las muchas cosas que se venden, eso sí es algo caro pero la fruta que allí se vende es impresionante.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Excellent market to wonder around
text: Take a food market tour from the tourism office or just wonder around yourself. Great food stalls and there is lots to see and experience - go and enjoy

title: Auf jeden Fall zu empfehlen
text: Dieser Ort ist ein muss.Es gibt soviel leckere Sachen zu kaufen. Da ist für jeden etwas dabei.Mein persönliches Highlight der frische Fisch und der Kaffeestand.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Really nice place!
text: One of the greatest outdoor market that i ever seen! All type of food and very nice price, the best for a good and fast meal

title: Genuino
text: Mercado en la calle en pleno centro de Múnich a dos pasos de Marien Platz y de las iglesias del Espíritu Santo y San Miguel. Puestos de comida (salchichas, quesos, fruta, verdura...) típicas alemanas. Lugares con mesas exteriores para tomar algo tipo self service. Es una plaza amplia y muy agradable de recorrer sus puestos.

title: Обычный рынок
text: Это самый обычный рынок, какие есть везде в Европе. Набор стандартный. Простые продукты, как везде. Не понимаю, чем тут можно восхищаться. Конечно, овощи значительно лучшего качества (и ассортимент шире), чем в России, так ведь это все интересно, если ты можешь купить их и там же приготовить, но для меня это в поездке не актуально, поэтому не имеет смысла ходить и прицениваться по рядам. Ну, купите сыра там немного или колбасы какой-нибудь, положите в багаж...много вы таким образом продуктов с собой увезете? А вообще, овощи нужно не на таких рынках в центре города покупать, а где-нибудь поближе к месту произрастания. Например, в сезон спаржи везде прилавочки стоят, торгуют спаржей практически с поля возле самих полей и в окрестных городках.В центре рынка Виктуалиенмаркт находится кафе Nordsee. Вокруг этого заведения распространяется страшный, одуряющий запах жареного...очень неприятный. До того, что мне было даже трудно в это кафе зайти. А вообще...Минут за 40 до закрытия там уже все совершенно пусто (в смысле готовой еды), даже никаких бутербродов нет, низкий старт...мы уже закрываемся. Очень разочаровало меня это заведение. Те, кто там работает, по-английски не разговаривает и не особенно стремится обслуживать тех, кто не говорит по-немецки. Просто уходят, не дозовешься никого, не очень-то дружелюбны. Из готовых деликатесов...я уж была готова попробовать кое-что, но когда увидела, какое там огромное количество мух летает, и они все время садятся на этих готовых креветок-лобстеров в открытых емкостях, то просто отказалась от этой мысли. Весьма недовольная моим поздним приходом латиноамериканская дама на выдаче в окошке смогла мне предложить по купону только маленькую коробочку жареных креветок с соусом. Один раз попробовать можно,но не более. Этот сильнейший одуряющий запах жареного везде (даже на подступах к Nordsee) ужасен.

title: Variegato
text: Questo storico mercato si trova a due passi da Marieplatz ed è pieno di negozi e di colori.Qui si può trovare lo street food e acquistare le specialità bavaresi.Mi è piaciuto molto e per questo ne consiglio caldamente la visita!
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Buenísimo
text: Está en pleno centro de Múnich, cantadas de sitios donde comer o tomar algo. Muy amables en los puestos, recomiendo las salchichas y patatas fritas para reponerse. Hay carnicerías, salchicherías y queserías muy buenas. Más adelante te encuentras puestos de flores, artesanía local. Imprescindible en Múnich.

title: mercato storico in centro
text: storico mercato situato a 100 metri dalla piazza principale. si può trovare di tutto, generi alimentari, fiori, oggettistica, chioschi dove assaporare le specialità bavaresi. spettacolo i negozi di macelleria.da non perdere

title: Ein großer Markt mit einer tollen auswahl
text: Auf dem Viktualienmarkt kann man hervorragend einkaufen und frische Lebensmittel erwerben. Man erhält hier Obst, Gemüse, Fisch, Fleisch, Gewürze, Bretter und vieles mehr. Die Preise sind sehr unterschiedlich und vieles kommt aus der Region

title: Da visitare
text: A due passi da Marienplatz, molto caratteristico e assolutamente da visitare. Tante bancarelle e negozi dove poter acquistare e degustare tutte le specialità locali.Sempre molto affollato, ideale per pranzo o per una pausa tra una passeggiata e l'altraPotete trovare ogni tipo di specialità bavarese

title: Marché en plein cœur de Munich
text: À deux pas de la Marienplatz se tient ce marché en extérieur. De l'ambiance, des bonnes odeurs, les étals côtoient les petits stands de restauration : c'est agréable.

title: Ein Muss für jeden Besucher Münchens
text: Der Viktualienmarkt ist Treffpunkt sowohl für die einheimischen Münchner als auch für die Besucher aus aller Welt. Über 140 Stände und Läden bieten bayrische und exotische Waren an. Ob zum Einkauf für daheim, als kleines Häppchen für Zwischendurch im Stehen oder unter den Kastanienbäumen sitzend, die kulinarischen Besonderheiten sind fast unbegrenzt. Hier präsentiert sich Münchner Lebensart in seiner reinsten Form. Der Viktualienmarkt ist ein absolutes Muß für jeden Genießer.

title: Herrlich
text: Abstecher auf den Viktualienmarkt - alles was das Herz begehrt. Frisch gezapftes Bierchen, Sonne, nette Gespräche, ohne plumpe Anmache. Einfach gemütlich eben. Den Trubel rundum beobachten. Schlendern über den Markt. Und zwischen drin ein bayrisches Original. Immer wieder gerne und ein Muss bei einem Münchenbesuch.

title: Caratteristico
text: Mercatino molto turistico (anche se è difficile trovare operatori che parlino, non dico italiano, ma almeno inglese)! Tutto sommato un giro lo merita
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Best food in Munich
text: Fantastic experience as you get to choose a local vendor and eat some of the best food that Germany has to offer! Would highly recommend getting a beer and bratwurst is this charming area.

title: Bella atmosfera e tanto cibo
text: Un ottimo posto dove fare un giro per curiosare, vedere cibi tipici del luogo e la vita cittadina, ma anche per fermarsi a mangiare e/o bere una birra. Molta scelta e possibilità di sedersi. Prezzi nella media
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Un bel mercato cittadino
text: Il mercato presenta numerosissime bancarelle, colorate e ben assortite. Le tradizioni locali la fanno da padrone, vale la pena visitarlo se ci si trova a Monaco. Qui è possibile provare di tutto e di più della cucina bavarese.

title: Ein Münchner MUSS
text: Wer in München ist muss sich Zeit nehmen für den Viktualienmarkt- sich treiben lassen- probieren und einkaufen. Eine Sinnesreise vom feinsten

title: Divertido
text: Es un mercado muy animado en el centro de la cuidad. Muy fácilmente se puede tomar una cerveza en un puesto, comer unas wurst en otro, comprar fruta fresca (estuvimos en verano)... es un sitio muy animado. Los puestos de comida son deliciosos, pero también hay restaurantes  por si se quiere un ambiente más tranquilo.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: سوق شعبي
text: زحمة وأسعار مرتفعه وغير نظيف والماء القذرة بشوارع بكثرة ولكن يقابلها لطافة البائعين ولكن لا يخفضوا في سعر

title: Toller Markt mit vielen Leckereien
text: Bei einem Städtetripp nach München darf ein Besuch auf dem Viktualienmarkt nicht fehlen. Es gibt hier alles was das Herz begehrt. Vom Leberkäse über Kartoffelsalat bis zu sauren Gurken ist alles erhältlich was den Gaumen erfreut. Ebenso gibt es unzählige andere Stände, die zum störbern einladen.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Worth a wonder around
text: It an average food market found in many European country. Nothing special but worth walking around. The market has beer garden with lots of different places at eat and drink.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: INCANTEVOLE
text: Più di un semplice mercato,è un posto fantastico ti permette di assaporare pietanze tipiche bavaresi : dalla carne alle zuppe ( da provare assolutamente al Munich Soup Kitchen).

title: El Mercado más famoso y grande de Múnich!!
text: Situado en pleno centro histórico de la ciudad, al mismo lado de Marienplatz.Viktualienmarkt es el mercado gastronómico más famoso de la ciudad. Infinidad de puestos con toda clase de productos tanto exóticos como delicatessen.A lo largo del mercado hay bancos para comer o tomarse algo.

title: Best coffee
text: Great coffee and neat little florentines!   Lots of other shops with fresh food - coffee shop is on the entrance to the market from the river side :)

title: Ποικιλία επιλογών για φαγητό .
text: Φρούτα και λουλούδια που δεν γνωρίζετε καν το όνομά τους . Φρεσκότατα , σε ποιότητα εξαιρετική , αλλά και σε τιμές για γερά πορτοφόλια :σαν να ταξίδεψαν ως εδώ , σε 1η θέση αεροπλάνου , και με ζώνη ασφαλείας .Ποικιλία επιλογών για φαγητό : θαλασσινά , λουκάνικα , κοτόπουλα , αμέτρητα είδη τυριών , ζεστές και χορταστικότατες σούπες , γλυκά , καφέδες και παγωτά , και φυσικά ατελείωτη γκάμα από τοπικές μπύρες και σναπς .Μπόλικες κρήνες για να δροσιστείτε , να πιείτε με την ψυχή σας , και να πλύνετε ότι μόλις αγοράσατε .Υπέροχα αγάλματα κοσμούν τις κρήνες , τα περισσότερα γεμάτα με όμορφα λουλούδια .

title: Great experience
text: This market was close to our hotel and we ended up visiting it twice during our visit because we liked it so much - once for lunch and once for dinner.  Walking around was fun and we were able to try different food and do lots of people watching while eating and drinking in the beer garden.  Not to be missed!

title: Meglio di tante birrerie
text: Angolo pittoresco di Monaco, dove si possono trovare tante bancarelle di frutta e verdura, ma anche oggettistica e altro, in una zona di Monaco che è appena dietro Marienplatz ma sembra distante anni luce. Si beve dell'ottima birra in botte, meglio di tante rinomate birrerie, e si mangiano tutte quelle specialità che da bravo turista ti aspetti di trovare in Germania. Insomma niente colpi di originalità, ma onesto e rilassante nella bolgia Agostana di Monaco. Uno street food alla tedesca?

title: Pour flâner avec les locaux
text: Un vrai endroit de vie où les locaux boivent de la bière au litre avec une saucisse.Des stands de différente nourriture et on s assoit ou l on trouve de la place.C est à faire pour l ambiance et à 2 pas de la Marienplatz.Plein de fontaine d eau ou l on peut boire.Marche tout au long de la journée on y trouve aussi des fruits et légumesSympa pour se plonger dans l ambiance de Munich

title: Ir con paciencia, siempre hay mucha gente
text: Visitar el Viktualienmark es encontrar el espíritu Bávaro en un solo lugar. Se puede encontrar una enorme variedad de productos ,y es un placer compartir en enormes mesas comunitarias. Ir con paciencia, siempre hay mucha gente.

title: Maravilhoso!
text: Diversas barracas, nesse mercado antigo. Tem de especialidades árabes, flores, azeitonas pretas, verdes, com recheios ou não de vários tipos, queijos diversos, tudo com direito a degustação, para você ter certeza do que está levando. Também, se a fome bater, diversas opções de comidas bávaras, peixes e frutos do mar, entre outras! E, claro, aquela cerveja, que só em Munique se sabe fazer!

title: Nice market
text: Visited on a recent trip to Bavaria. We visited Munich for the day & this market reminded me of the ones we get in Manchester at Christmas, but without the cold & the crowds. It is very traditional & there are lots of things to eat, drink or purchase as gifts.

title: Cranky Vendor
text: We visited Munich and just stumbled upon this lovely market. However when we decided to wait in line at this one particular vender who sold creamy spreads I finally got to the front of the line and apparently just because you wait in line you don’t get served when it’s your turn. I patiently waited my turn & when it was my turn the owner told me, no it’s not your turn, I’m taking this other lady...who walked up on the other side of the line and who got there after us. Really?? So when I said OK and walked away she seemed surprised. There’s plenty other vendors to buy from there and I didn’t need to give her my business. If you can’t treat your customers kindly, then I can very easily go somewhere else. And that’s what we did. Got a beer & pretzel and enjoyed it. Unfortunately we didn’t have a lot of time to spend there & I was upset we wasted it at that particular vendor when we could have spent it elsewhere. Instead My memories of this market is of a cranky vendor.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Nice market
text: Lots of great stalls with all sorts of meats and produce. Plenty of Knick knacks too. But the highlight is definitely the beer garden in the middle.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Gut
text: Ziemlich cooler Markt. Ich glaube hier findet jeder was. Wir waren begeistert. War zwar viel los aber dennoch gut

title: Bring Cash
text: This is a wonderful market. You can have a snack and enjoy a biergarten in between sight seeing. The only down side is Munich is a cash only city. We were surprised to see such a busy city not care less about tourist being able to make purchases using credit cards. I would have spent a lot more if they took credit. Munich as a whole is not designed to be tourist friendly, allow yourself time to get lost (a lot). We still had a great time.l and recommend a visit here at least once.

title: Not a tourist trap! It’s also a locals place
text: This is very cool and a chance to hang out with many locals who buy groceries and beer here. The beer area I fun to sit and chat it up with locals. This area can only sell the 6 brands of beer you’ll only find at October fest. Also read about the big beer drum under sidewalk and they change one of the six beers on a rotation for the area

title: Choices galore
text: This is the perfect place to try different things. Within the market you can have all sorts of food.they also have crafty items for sale.

title: 시장
text: 시장 규모가 크지는 않다. 과일 등 식품을 위주로 파는 것 같다. 앉을 곳이 있어 식사를 간단하게 해결할 수 있다. 특별하진 않지만 시장 구경하는 것을 좋아해 나쁘지 않았다.

title: Le vrai Munich est là !
text: Parfait, irrésistible, le coeur de Munich est là ! J'adore ce marché et chaque fois que je vais à Munich, je fais mon tour de marché. Les fruits, les légumes, les fleurs, le pain excellent, le miel, et les fromages, tout est frais, bon, les commerçants sont aimables, et les petits restaurants autours du marché sont parfaits !Ne manquez pas de gouter une weisse Wurst, spécialité munichoise avec une chope de bière et vous vous sentirez munichois...

title: Schlaraffenland
text: Hier gibt es alles man man sich von einem Markt erhofft. Es gibt so viel zu entdecken und sehen und nebenbei füllt man immer weiter den Einkaufskorb bis man ihn nicht mehr tragen kann. Einfach nur traumhaft und falls man zwischendurch eine Pause einlegen will nimmt man gemütlich im Biergarten platz. Ich platze nahezu vor Neid, dass es so einen tollen Markt nicht in meiner Nähe gibt.

title: Stalls, Food & Beer
text: Good market to enjoy some beer, food, fish and fruit. Not very big and stalls don't stay open till late.

title: ESTUPENDO MERCADO GASTRONOMICO
text: En la calle,los puestos gastronómicos,con todas las especialidades,merece la pena recorrer  y tomar algo,sentandose  en los espacios preparados para ello,también hay objetos decorativos y puestos de flores,no puedo uno ir a Munich y no pasar  por aquí

title: Nice Market
text: It is something to see if you are in Munich. We spent about an hour walking around and trying various foods and drinks.  Of course there is beer, but we especially enjoyed trying Bavarian cheese from a tiny cheese shop. So GOOD!  The ice cream we had was also yummy.  We saw meat shops, pastries, fresh juice, fruits and vegetables, and flowers.  The souvenir stalls were minimal.

title: Einer der schönsten Märkte Deutschlands
text: Der ganzjährig und täglich geöffnete Markt liegt in unmittelbarer Nähe zum Marienplatz. Hier kann man hervorragend Essen. Vom Croissant bis zur Schweinshaxe. Zudem bekommt man Fleisch, Fisch, Wurst, Käse, Kräuter, Blumen usw. von sehr hoher Qualität. Hier treffen sich die Touristen genauso wie die Münchner. Die Preise sind jedoch sehr gehoben.

title: Très bien pour l'ambiance
text: marché extérieur, avec de nombreux exposants. fruits, légumes, produits manufacturés, ...la visite est agréable.de nombreux bars et restaurants vendent sur la place, et 1 grande zone est réservée avec des tables et bancs type food court

title: This is what we were looking for
text: This is just what we are looking for in our food experience to Munich.  Large open market with any kind of food you can think of. We went straight for German food and pastries. We found a picnic table I grabbed a beer and the kids went off to buy whatever food they wanted.  It’s not for tourists as you can tell there are some locals scattered throughout. And there are some excellent shops to see in sample from.  Like teenagers tried the leberkase and are now hooked.  I need to find out if the German buchert by us at home in NJ makes it.

title: Great
text: Not a big market , however interesting and busy . Mainly food and drinks etc ... lots of places to drink beer and fish market ! Worth a visit !
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Good place for beer and sausages
text: Walking distance from Mariensplatz,  you can find fresh fruit ( we picked up dome outstanding cherries )and local produce on top of the excellent German beers and sausages.  A must visit at least once during your stay at Munich.  Please reach early around 5 if you plan to eat supper , the stalls sell out pretty quickly
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Fun way to spend a morning
text: We enjoyed walking around here on a Saturday morning sampling fresh, traditional food.   Worth the time if you enjoy a casual stroll on a sunny day!

title: Para disfrutar con todos los sentidos
text: El Viktualienmarkt es el mercado local donde se pueden comprar alimentos y artesanías locales. Como ya había almorzado, compré unas frutillas que eran en extremo sabrosas. Su consistencia, color y sabor eran inmejorables. Los puestos de quesos y flores son especialmente bonitos.

title: Wonderful market worth a visit!
text: Location: Take the metro to Marienplatz.This is a wonderful market to visit! You can find fresh vegetables and other things in this market. There are also different kinds of restaurants around the area. Recommendation: Certainly worth a visit!
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Konzert
text: Ich kann nur jeden ermuntern, statt im Hotel zu frühstücken, sich auf dem Viktualienmarkt durchzuschlemmen!Es ist alles geboten was das Herz begehrt.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: The famous market
text: What a lovely cultural experience and outstanding historical landmarks also. The food market is a must see and do for anyone visiting Munich. Bring empty stomachs and full wallets as there is a lot to eat and drink. You can’t guarantee a seat in the food market beer garden though so come before it gets too busy. Plenty of places to explore and eat at throughout the day and excellent beer.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Très sympathique
text: Vous trouverez tout ce que vous avez besoin pour boire et manger.À noter que le marché est par secteur (boucherie, poisson, café, fruits, etc)De plus à 5 minutes de Marienplatz.

title: Non perdetelo per nessun motivo!!!
text: Credo sia uno dei posti più caratteristici che abbiamo trovato a Monaco, in una parola: "colorato", sia dai generi alimentari,sia dai banchetti, sia dalle tantissime persone, del posto e non, che affollano questa splendida area, a due passi da Marienplatz. Personalmente c'ho pranzato diverse volte e mi sono trovato molto meglio qui che nelle rinomate birrerie dei dintorni. Se decidete di pranzarci durante i mesi estivi, fate attenzione a scegliervi una panca all'ombra, la birra altrimenti si scalda subito, ed è un vero peccato! :)
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Hora de comer !!!
text: Prefeito ! Tem Biergarten e muita comida alemã , petiscos , cerveja da boa e frutos do mar no entorno, vinho também , muito legal! Vale a pena bater perna aí. Ao lado da Marienplatz

title: Munchen 🇩🇪
text: In Munchen, in the downtown, approximately near Marien Platz, there is this tipical Bavarian market. You can find everything to buy a present, to drink and food etc.

title: Schöner Markt
text: Ich liebe gutes Essen und Lebensmittel,deshalb gehe ich auch gerne auf Märkte und der Viktualienmarkt ist wirklich einen Besuch wert. Kulinarisch wird hier wirklich alles geboten von Obst,Gemüse,Käse,Wurst und Oliven. Schön ist auch, dass man alles kaufen kann und dann bequem als Bortzeit mit einem schönen Bier im Biergarten in der Mitte des Platzes genießen kann. Das finde ich wirklich auch eine sehr sympatisch Eigenschaft der Bayern das man nicht dazu genötigt wird etwas zu essen sondern sich auch was eigenes mitbringen kann.Der Markt hält auf alle Fälle viele Köstlichkeiten zum Schlemmen bereit😋

title: Feira no centro antigo
text: Essa feira fica no centro antigo e é possível acessar de transporte público.  Há barracas de comidas, flores e artesanato local. Não vende roupas ou sapatos. Ela é mais conhecida pelas comidas e há várias mesas e bancos para fazer sua refeição. A questão é conseguir um cantinho para sentar porque na hora do almoço fica lotada. Tem frutas, doces, refeições, lanches para todos os gostos e bolsos. Vale à pena. Nos arredores tem restaurantes convencionais mas ficam praticamente vazios, pois o point é a feira.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Great beer garden
text: Sat under the trees on a warm sunny day, giant beers, good food, and a band playing that Bavarian om-pa-pa music. Self service works for me, especially as German service sometimes leaves a lot to be desired in tourist areas. Huge range of good food available from a variety of nearby vendors. Worth a visit.

title: Great place to spend a couple of hours
text: Great market with a big variety of stalls (coffee, fruit/veg, fish, beers, cheeses, meat etc). Spent a happy couple of hours, tasting samples, watching people, being amazed by exotic fruits I'd never seen before.Came on a Saturday and was pleasantly surprised it wasn't too touristy or tacky. It really is about food and drink, not souvenirs or tat. People just seem to come here for actual shopping, and to have a nice time having a drink and/or some food with friends.If you're looking to spend a couple of hours without spending (too much) money; this is an ideal place.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: ミュンヘンの市場で楽しむ
text: 観光客のみならず地元のグルメも集まるらしい。野菜や果物、花、香辛料、ワイン、チーズ、お土産など見て回るのは楽しいです。果物を買ってホテルの部屋で食べましたが、新鮮で美味しかったです。お昼にはビールと食事を買って、木陰のテーブルでのんびりランチ。もちろんレストランもありますが、お天気がいい日は外がおすすめです。

title: Food, Beer and Commerce
text: This market was one of the first places we visited in Munich because I thought it would be a great way to see the city through its commerce.  While food and drink were the primary commodities, there was all kind of things for sale.  Our family enjoyed looking at the booths before finally settling on sausage, pretzels and beer for lunch.  The central part of the market and every Bavarian city is the maypole (Munich's in Bavarian blue and white) which is used to display the kinds of occupations in each town.  There is tradition of stealing maypole to ransom them for beer.  This a fun place that simply has to be experienced on any trip to Munich.

title: ein Erlebnis
text: Der Viktualienmarkt gehört zum München-Besuch dazu. Bummeln, die herrlichen Gemüse, Obst und exotische Köstlichkeiten betrachten, einfach wunderbar. In der Sonne sitzen und ein Glas Wein trinken, überlege ob man deftig essen,  oder Fisch möchte. Einfach grandios.

title: A genuine slice of Munich life
text: Just go. It's easy to get to, right by the historic Marienplatz. It's not expensive - hey, it's a market! They have great variety, both for people-watching and food selections. Get snacks for your continuing city stroll, or sit down an enjoy some of the local specialties. If you have access to a kitchen, get all your ingredients here - and I mean everything! Oils, spices, sauces, meats, cheeses, breads, even the flowers to decorate the table. Just go.

title: Best place
text: ...hat einfach viel Charme...sehen und staunen...vieles überteuert... Muenchen innen eben....Leberkäse Semmel und ein Paar Wiener beim Metzger in der * Fleischstrasse* waren reell und ein guter Platz. Weinstand  aus Kallstadt ...Pfalz...Fisch...Obst..Gemüse... Kaese...was das Herz begehrt....
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Keine wünsche bleiben offen
text: Der Viktualienmarkt ist ein absoluter Hingucker in München...Ein muss..Feinschmecker kommen hier auf ihre Kosten..

title: pintoresco
text: un lugar con mucha esencia alemana, pintoresco y auténtico.ideal para comer algo de la comida típica bávara o comprar productos locales para llevar de souvenir

title: Nicht versäumen
text: Eine Weißwurst und ein Bier am Viktualienmarkt ist bei einem Münchenbesuch ebenso ein Muss wie das Schlendern über diesen Platz..

title: вкусно, колоритно
text: Это не просто рынок, а место где вам приготовят много свежего и вкусного. Сырные лавки в этом месте усыпаны разными сырами и не только Германскими, но и Итальянскими и Французскими. Колоритно конечно. Побывать нужно!

title: ミュンヘン市内最古　そして最大の市場　マリエン広場からすぐ
text: マリエン広場からほど近い　目印のマイバウムを中心に　大きな野外市場は色々な食材や雑貨や屋台　ビールを楽しめるビヤガーデンもある　持ち込み自由なビアガーデンなので市場で買ったグルメとともに楽しめる手作りの雑貨も可愛らしく　女性も男性も楽しめる

title: Munich en esencia !!
text: A pocos metros de Marienplatz te encuentras con este mercado que a la vista es todo un placer y para la comida tambien. Hay de todo tanto para llevar como para sentarte en una de las mesas que hay para tomar una cerveza o para comer.Puedes pasar un rato muy agradable merodeando por todo el mercado. Visita imprescindible. Y si encuentras un buen recuerdo para llevartelo a casa o regalar pues mejor que mejor.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Colorful and tasty food market
text: A fun place to visit. Walking amidst the food stands we were tempted by Bavarian specialties amidst high quality gourmet attractions. In the center of the market one can sit to sample the local beer.

title: Gourmet feast for the eyes and tummy!
text: Fantastic area to stroll around.   Great restaurants to stop in for a light meal or a beer.  Tons of stands with beautiful displays of fruit / vegetables / crafts / sausages / toys / mustards / flowers ... you name it.Huge old fashioned Maypole in the middle.  Interesting to note that Munich  proclaimed the Reinheitsgebot in 1487 while the rest of Germany didn’t adopt it till 1908.Note: entire area closed on Sunday
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Marché au çentre de München
text: Marché sis au centre de Munich. A quelques pas de l’hotel de ville. Eau coup de stand avec de la nourriture.Les prix sont élevés.

title: Lugar típico /comida deliciosa
text: Que lugar tan pintoresco/ la comida deliciosa y luego sentarse  en las mesas en el parque compartir con los locales y tomarse una deliciosa Cerveza

title: Fun Open Market and Tastings
text: Wonderful meats and cheeses to taste and get for a picnic later. Stop for a coffee, fresh juice or stop and the picturesque restaurants for a beer. You could go on a tour but many of the stores will give you samples anyway, so do this one on your own and catch one of the other tours.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: München Besuch
text: Morgens über den Viktualienmarkt schlendern macht am meisten Spaß, denn da ist es noch nicht sehr voll und die Stände sind noch gut bestückt. Man kann den Einheimischen beim Einkaufen und feilschen zuschauen. Auf den Viktualienmarkt kann sehr viel Exotisches entdecken!Auf jeden Fall ein Besuch wert!
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Самобытное место
text: Хорошее расположение, много разнообразных тематических лавочек с продуктами, сувенирами, пряностями, цветами.

title: Huge market with lots of restaurants
text: This market was very close to where we stayed so we walked through here several times. There were lots of places to eat and shops. Had some good German fare-sausage and sauerkraut and beer! Didn’t buy much but enjoyed shopping.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Feine Frischkost und gemütlicher Biergarten
text: Der Viktualienmarkt ist immer einen Abstecher Wert!Gemüse, Obst, Blumen, u.s.w.Natürlich auch ein Mass und eine Brezel im Biergarten.Besonders zur erwähnen:Die Toiletten sind für die vielen Besucher sehr sehr sauber!!!Danke den netten Damen 😉👍💐Da habe ich in guten Häusern oder viel Teureren Toiletten geshen, die hier nicht das Wasser reichen können 😉👍

title: Gezellige markt
text: Veel vaste kramen met de heerlijkste waren zoals fruit, groente, brood, kruiden etc.Veel eetgelegenheden zoals vis en typische Beierse gerechten. Uiteraard hoort daar een bier of een wijn bij. Dit alles nuttigt men aan lange tafels op een groot plein onder de bomen.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Divino!
text: Para ir más de una vez seguro. Solo esta de lunes a viernes. La plaza es fantástica, mucha sombra y muchas mesas donde sentarse a degustar algún plato de los muchos que se ofrecen o comer lo que lleves. Hay algún bar que tiene su sector de mesas y sillas pero la mayor parte es libre. Cada uno se sienta donde encuentra lugar y come lo que quiere o lleve consigo.También hay tiendas de artesanías fantásticas, Dulces, quesos, vinos, plantas, frutas,etc. Para ir más de una vez!

title: Shop 'til you drop farmer's market!
text: a picturesque farmer's market with mostly food and also craft items and plants.  The displays are visually pleasing and it is easy to flow from one row to another.

title: One of my favourite markets
text: I really love this place, but to get the full experience, you have to visit when it’s in full swing. It’s still worth a look at other times too. A unique and very German market place with some great independent, quality retailers.

title: A sight to behold
text: From the beautifully arranged fruit & veg, flowers, cheese, breads and plenty of other specialities, this market place is a vibrant show of colour and gastronomical delights! Unfortunately I couldn’t take any home but made the most of it while I was able!

title: OK, good for vegetarians!
text: There’s a lot of stalls here and a lot of different food and drinks.  Your biggest challenge might be deciding what to eat.  The fruit juices were good, and the ice cream excellent.

title: Один из самых дорогих рынков Германии и Европы.
text: Если Вы целый день бродили по Мюнхену, осмотрели исторический центр и соборы  и проголодались, вам необходимо зайти сюда и предаться чревоугодию. Почти все продукты свежайшие и вкусные, пиво отличное, продавцы шутят и улыбаются, официанты спешат вас обслужить. Жить хорошо и жизнь хороша. Главное , чтобы денег хватило - это один из самых дорогих рынков Германии и Европы.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Lots of food shops, beer garden and sun and shade
text: A great escape from nearby Mariennplatz and the shops. Here the foods are so well presented in the many general and speciality shops. There is a beer garden area all in the shade where it is lovely to sit and share a table with others and make new friends!

title: Not what I expected
text: Maybe my expectations were too high or I just went at a bad time.  I had these visions of a big, bustling, picturesque market.  This is just an average market, frankly.  A very old average market, granted, but if you have a nice farmers market at home you're not going to be blown away.  We picked up a beer which was fine and pretzel which was not good.  This is the type of market I would frequent if I lived locally and wanted to pick up some great produce for dinner.  I don't really understand why it's such a tourist destination?
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Ótimo biergarten
text: O local é gostoso para escolher um lanche, queijos, azeitonas ou outros produtos que são ali vendidos e apreciar em uma das mesas. Claro que com uma boa cerveja alemã! Baita astral. Gostamos muito!
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Cozy german market in town!
text: Been walking around the shops several times during my stay.I really liked walking around different typical shops and have a beer or a coffee or a meal surrounded by the Bavarian culture.You can also find souvenirs, flower, butchers, fishmongers, cafes, fruit, smoothies, bratwurst, etc...It is really an nice atmosphere and I definitely recommend to visit it!
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Find your Bavarian taste
text: it was fun to see this markey, full with different hings and taste of Bavaria. we got familiar with many Food, tastes and drink there which is good as educational way.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Lots to see
text: We loved strolling through this large outdoor market. Lots of fruit and vegetables as well as cheese olives and even seafood. Pedestrian only area.

title: Best cultural trip!
text: Discover a place with its foods, fruits and decorations- experience the warmth of Bavaria and the not so warm Bavarian attitude-

title: Munich
text: Si hay un sitio que define lo que es Munich creo que es el Virtualienmarkt, llueva o haga sol siempre hay gente. Divertido y de mucha vida.

title: Mercado al aire libre !!
text: viktualienmarkt, un mercado al aire libre en pleno corazón de la ciudad de Munich. En el se encuentra una gran selección de puestos de frutas, comida y como no, una Biergarten. Un lugar fantástico para comer al aire libre, tomar unas cervezas y probar unos buenos bocadillos de salchichas.Muy recomendable !
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Cool
text: Die Menge der unterschiedlichen Angebote  machte Spaß zu schauen und zu probieren Der Käsestand hat mich begeistert... ich durfte unendlich probieren und hab viel gekauft

title: Viktualienmarkt at Night
text: We visited the Viktualienmarkt at night and it was so lovely.  The food, the shops, the people...a nice evening!

title: Fun Market for Shopping and Food
text: We had a great time walking around this market.  We got some souvenirs for family here, and also drank beer and had some food.  There was a honey store that had some yummy honey wine too!
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Great Place for Food, Shopping and Beer
text: This huge market is located just outside the Marienplatz on the other side of the Old Town Hall.  It is filled with shops and booths selling every kinds of German food (meats, cheeses, fruits and vegetables, breads, etc.), souvenirs (many hand-made), clothing, etc.  There is also a huge outdoor German beer garden with numerous shared tables, and plenty of beer and food served and a good time by all.  For those who don't drink beer there is also a nice wine bar serving many local and European wines. There are also several full restaurants surrounding the market. This whole area is busy throughout the day and night, but especially comes to life at night.  Highly recommend you stopping by during both the daytime and at night to get two different perspectives.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Excellent Local Market
text: We walked from Marienplatz to this market. We never regret visiting this place. Local produce were found abundantly there. We were especially delighted to discover one organic food stall/shop, and found some interesting spreads for bread + seasonings that can be used for cooking. That turned out to be the main place from where we purchased our 'exploits/souveniors' from Europe during our May/June tour.

title: Delightful, Huge Range of Goods for Sale, Great Atmosphere
text: So many stalls and so much to choose from with almost everything edible for sale. A number of specialist shops such as the one that has everything related to honey. Plenty of safe drinking water from fountains where we washed beautiful ripe cherrys. It has some seating areas as well as a large beer garden. Full of atmosphere and in the centre is a huge Bavarian maypole! A great place and very close to the city centre square.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Stunning Food Market
text: This is the most wonderful Food Market and Restaurant area very near to Marienplatz. Super stalls selling every sort of produce, great places to eat, A fantastic place to head late morning and stay for lunch. Well worth a lunchtime visit.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: LE MARCHE BAVAROIS
text: Cette place se situe à proximité immédiate de la Marienplatz. Elle est très animée, ombragée et l'on y trouve de très nombreux produits locaux, fromages, charcuteries, fruits, légumes, fleurs, souvenirs, etc ... Au centre trône un immense Biergarten et juste en face un excellent restaurant de poissons. Les poissons sont frais et ils sont préparés devant vous. Nous y avons dégusté des demi-langoustes.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Don't get Your Hopes Up
text: I'm a sucker for a European market so this was pretty much top of my list of things to see on our visit but, like most things in Munich, a massively over-hyped disappointment (cheers all you half-Bavarian You-Tube reviewers).  It's not that big, it's just modern, glass-fronted stalls like small shops and it's never, ever open.  I reckon the only way anybody makes any money here is by drawing in gullible tourists who sit at the surrounding bars waiting in vain for something to happen.Munich delivers another massive disappointment!  Don't waste your money.  Go to France instead.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Nice market
text: I would recommend a visit if you are in Munich.  We had lunch and walked around.  However, most of the shops are food or flowers, so not much to buy if you're a visitor staying at a hotel.

title: Akutell noch hochwertiger Lebensmittel- und Spezialitätenmarkt
text: Auch wenn auf den Viktualienmarkt inzwischen immer neue Verkaufsflächen hereingepresst werden, so ist das Qualitätsniveau der verkauften Waren immer noch top. Auf die Andenkenpalette könnte man getrost verzichten. Leider verliert der Markt aber so sein authentisches Ambiente und verkommt langsam zu einer Touristenfalle.

title: Molto caratteristico
text: Abbiamo mangiato e bevuto bene, non è detto che perché sei seduto ai tavoli all’aperto spendi meno, ma non è male. Occhio ai piccioni sulla testa...ma è folklore!
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Sit with a beer and experience an authentic German market!
text: This is a walking market with stalls with specialty breads, cheeses, meats, fruits, vegetables and anything German you might want.  Buy a sandwich and a beer and absorb the experience and atmosphere of Munich.  It is a lovely refuge from heat and the bustle of a large city all tucked away in the old city and a great place to rest your feet.  If you prefer, purchase the fixings for a great lunch at the stalls and sit down at a table to enjoy. It can get busy so get your table quickly..

title: Тут можно попробовать колбаски)
text: Огромный рынок, можно купить знаменитые мюнхенские колбаски (сырые), но в каждой почти лавочке их же и жарят на гриле, так что можно перекусить. Помимо колбасок, видела ещё, что продают сыры, овощи, цветы и украшения для сада.

title: Η κουλτούρα τής πόλης..
text: Ήμουν τυχερός σέ μία ηλιόλουστη μέρα που όλο τό Μόναχο ήταν έξω... έζησα τήν κουλτούρα τής πόλης σέ αυτή τή πλατεία δίπλα ακριβώς από τήν marienplatz... τίς τιμές γιά τό φαγητό κ τήν μπύρα τίς θεώρησα πολύ λογικές...χαθηκα με τους ντόπιους έφαγα ήπια πέρασα πολύ όμορφα... άν θέλεις νά δεις λίγο από τόν αέρα τής πόλης αξίζει

title: Viktualienmark
text: Local no centro de Munique Marienplapz, feira ao livre é tem de tudo,  um ótimo lugar para se conhecer e explorar. Vale a pena você ir.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Bummeln und naschen
text: Bummeln und die Seele baumeln lassenAn verschiedensten Ständen mal was essen und trinken Geniale Markt-Atmosphäre
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Mercado no coração da cidade
text: Desde frescos a especiarias,comes e bebes,a não perder numa visita  a Munique.Bons sítios para comer pratos regionais e para beber cerveja nas esplanadas agradáveis com bom tempo.

title: exotic bavarian fair
text: if you want to experience traditional bavarian organic food shopping and enjoying treats under the trees (biergarten) with friends and families..this is the place. a thematically designed area. each stall is specialised. for an example: mushrooms, potato, cheese, hand crafted decor etc. each stall is focused on one item or more. very easy to shop as per your need. very very friendly attendants. very high quality...a bit more expensive compared to supermarkets yet, they give you organic high quality items. besides shopping, you get to enjoy the warm ambiance there...like a picnic. you can stop by the kitchen mall of munich "kustermann", world's kitchen in this same area.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Einfach schön
text: Für mich persönlich einer der schönsten Plätze in ganz München. Gute und heimische Produkte und viele unglaublich schöne blumenläden. Dazu eine gute Gastronomie Auswahl.

title: tolles Angebot super Atmosphäre
text: hier muß man einfach gewesen sein. Tolles kulinarisches Angebot. Käse, Wein, Antpasti, Falaffel sind ein muss. Fisch, Fleisch, Gemüse super.

title: Definitely visit here
text: A really fun and interesting place to wander around. Great if you want to shop, and also worth going for a look. There is heaps to see and experience before you take a seat and enjoy a huge range of food and drink from many stalls. Everything from Bavarian sausage to fish and chips is available. There are historic fountains and buildings to see as well as the market. Worth visiting a couple of times.

title: Frühstücken auf dem Viktualienmarkt
text: Bier, Weißwurst und alles andere was das Herz begehrt gibt es auf dem Viktualienmarkt. Zudem auch noch viele Stände mit Handwerkskunst und tolle. Souvenirs.
visit: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

title: Центральный городской рынок
text: В Мюнхене это место знаковое. Мне кажется, что и у местных жителей (судя по их количеству) и конечно туристов. Здесь можно купить (понюхать, пощупать, попробовать) множество вкусняшек местного производства. Особенно это относится к мясных деликатесам: синой рульке, различным колбасам, сырам и конечно же  пиву.....ням ням ням...ох! Респект однозначно!
